ExtlRecShrPcklstOptn.name: ExtlRecShrPcklstOptn
ExtlRecShrPcklstOptn.description: Represents a picklist option of an external record share picklist field shared between a partner and vendor for Partner Connect.

ExtlRecShrFieldId.description: ID of the associated external record share field of type picklist.

IsDefaultOption.description: Indicates whether this picklist option is set as the default option (true) or not (false).
